title: Weather News Highlights: Cyclone won’t make landfall in Odisha or AP but move parallel to coast says IMD - The Indian Express
content:
1. Weather News Highlights: Cyclone won’t make landfall in Odisha or AP but move parallel to coast says IMD  The Indian Express
  2. Cyclone Asani to Recurve Towards Northwest Bay of Bengal Next Week, Cause Heavy Rainfall in Odisha, Andhra, West Bengal | The Weather Channel - Articles from The Weather Channel | weather.com  The Weather Channel
  3. Depression over Bay of Bengal may intensify today. IMD says 'monitoring closely'  Hindustan Times
  4. East Coast Braces For Cyclone, Odisha On Alert  NDTV
  5. Severe Cyclonic Storm predicted by Met Dept on 9th & 10th May in its latest bulletin  Kalinga TV
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: India Weather Forecast Today Updates, Rain in North India,Heatwave In India Updates, 7 May 2022:  The India Meteorological Department has warned that after respite over the last few days, heatwave conditions are expected over parts of Maharashtra, Vidarbha, Rajasthan, Haryana, Uttar Pradesh, Madhya Pradesh, Vidarbha and Delhi over the coming days.
